pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Plant Image Analysis // Tools for single or batch image manipulation and analysis as described by Olivoto (2022) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.13803 that can be used to quantify plant leaf area, assess disease severity, count objects, obtain shape measures, object landmarks, and compute Elliptical Fourier Analysis of the object outline, as described by Claude (2008) doi:10.1007/978-0-387-77789-4. Additionally, the package includes tools for analyzing grids, which enables high throughput field phenotyping using RGB imagery captured by unmanned aerial vehicles.
